action.action-desc: Mr. Davis of North Carolina (for himself and Mr. Ciscomani) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to update certain terminology regarding veteran employment.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Employment Readiness Yield Act of 2025 or the VERY Act of 2025.
